ai-patthana8.4:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.4:1.1_0: Not even for the sake of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.4:1.1_1: Not even for the sake of a cause or reason, nor for the sake of causes and reason.
ai-patthana8.4:1.1_2: Not because of this reason for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.4:2.1_0: Not because of this the cause or reason for the sake of purification of principle, nor for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana8.4:2.1_1: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the sake of principle, both for the sake of cause and reason.
ai-patthana8.4:2.1_2: Not because of cause or reason for the sake of this reason, neither for the sake of cause nor reason.
ai-patthana8.4:3.1_0: Not because of this, they don’t cause or reason for the sake of purification of mind.
